channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mike Johnson fires back at Hakeem Jeffries' 'desperate' call for televised shutdown debate
item.description: Speaker Mike Johnson rejects Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries' challenge for a primetime House floor debate on the ongoing government shutdown.

item.title: Cuomo Challenges Mamdani Over Intifada Stance
